name: unassignAllPhoneNumsAutoReceptionist
description:
Unassign all phone numbers that were previously assigned to an [auto receptionist](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360021121312-Managing-Auto-Receptionists-and-Interactive-Voice-Response-IVR-). **Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher account plan with Zoom Phone License * Account owner or admin permissions
**Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
